name: Release v1.15.0.
body:
New Features:

- Improved performance and scaling of CUDA backend.
- Improved performance across all backends via revised GiMMiK kernels.
- Support for detecting load imbalances for multi-rank simulations.
- Support for heterogeneous CPUs in the OpenMP backend.

name: Release v1.14.0.
body:
New Features:

- Improved region support for extraction and averaging including constructive solid geometry and multiple mesh layers on boundaries.
- Partition information now included in exported VTK files.
- libxsmm made a hard dependency for the OpenMP backend.

name: Release v1.13.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added support for DIRK integrators.
- Enabled precise locations for point sampler plugin.
- Improved support for CUDA- and HIP-aware MPI.
- Removed dependency on PyOpenCL.

name: Release v1.12.3.
body:
New Features:

- Added moment computation to fluidforce plugin.
- Added support for ROCm 4.5.0.
- Improved documentation.

name: Release v1.12.2.
body:
New Features:

- Fixed issue with ac-euler solver.
- Fixed issue with anti-aliasing and OpenMP backend.
- Performance improvements for HIP backend.

name: Release v1.12.1.
body:
New Features:

- Fixed bugs in mesh importer.
- Selection of quadrature rule for integrate plugin.
- Added a performance tuning guide to the documentation.

name: Release v1.12.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added high-order VTK export.
- Improved gradient export.
- Improved performance of OpenMP backend.

name: Release v1.11.0.
body:
New Features:

 * Added native HIP backend for targeting AMD GPUs.
 * Rewritten CUDA backend which no longer depends on PyCUDA.
 * Updated defaults for CUDA backend to improve out of the box performance.

name: Release v1.10.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added support for writing specific regions of the domain to disk.
- Fixed statistics collection for dual time stepping integrators.

name: Release v1.9.0.
body:
New Features:

- Improved strong scaling.
- Added support for Gmsh v4.1.
- Fixed performance issue with OpenCL backend.

name: Release v1.8.5.
body:
New Features:

- Added support for CLBlast.
- Added support for Gmsh v4.
- Added the optimal Runge-Kutta schemes of Vermeire et al. for pseudo time-stepping.

name: Release v1.8.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added locally adaptive pseudo-time-stepping.
- Added Riemann invariant boundary condition for artificial compressibility systems.

name: Release v1.7.6.
body:
New Features:

- Bug fixes in OpenCL backend.
- Bug fixes in parallel HDF5 writer.

name: Release v1.7.5.
body:
New Features:

- Added support for P0 multi-p convergence acceleration.
- Added maximum time-step option for PI controller.

name: Release v1.7.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added multi-p convergence acceleration for dual time stepping.

name: Release v1.6.0.
body:
New Features:

- Added incompressible Euler and Navier-Stokes solvers.
- Added support for Intel KNL.
- Added libxsmm as a matrix multiplication provider for C/OpenMP backend.
- Added kernel caching for C/OpenMP backend.

name: Release v1.5.0.
body:
New Features:
- Added dual time-stepping
- Added support for CUDA aware MPI

name: Release v1.4.0.
body:
New Features:
- Added CGNS mesh importer
- Added MIC backend for Intel Xeon Phi co-processors

name: Release v1.3.0.
body:
New Features:
- Interface to GiMMiK
- Solution gradient export
- 'Free-stream preserving' curved elements
- Time-step statistics plugin

name: Release v1.2.0.
body:
New Features:
- Plugin to time-average solution
- Solution-dependent source terms

name: Release v1.1.0.
body:
New Features:
- Residual plugin
- More spatially/temporally varying boundary conditions
- Viscous stresses from surface force plugin

name: Release v1.0.0.
body:
New Features:
- Space-time varying boundary conditions

name: Release v0.8.0.
body:
New Features:
- Shock capturing
- Parallel .vtu output
- Surface-force extraction

name: Release v0.3.0.
body:
New Features:
- Port to Python 3
- New file format based on HDF5
- More time-stepping schemes
- More boundary conditions
- On-the-fly point-data extraction

name: Release v0.2.4.
body:
New Features:
- Surface anti-aliasing
- Pyramids
- Improved documentation

name: Release v0.2.3.
body:
New Features:
- Adaptive time-stepping
- Space-time dependent source terms
- Filtering
- More Riemann solvers
- Improved documentation

name: Release v0.2.2.
body:
New Features:
- Mesh/solution re-partitioning
- Improved device selection for heterogeneous computing
- Improved documentation

name: Release v0.2.1.
body:
New Features:
- Volume anti-aliasing
- Additional boundary conditions
- Improved documentation

name: Release v0.2.0.
body:
New Features: 
- Performance improvements
- Tetrahedra
- Prisms
- OpenCL backend
